home.headline: I'm Prabhakar, a Multimedia Journalist.
home.subline: Bridging the Gap Between Ground Realities and National Discourse by using Journalism as a Tool for Justice—Covering Protests, Elections, and the Stories That Shape Society.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Multimedia and fact-check journalist with around 5 years of newsroom and field reporting experience across television, digital, and print platforms. Proven record of political and social storytelling, misinformation debunking, and ground reporting from protests, elections, and grassroots communities. Adept at using OSINT and verification tools to ensure accuracy and public-interest journalism.

institutions.name: Ph.D Research Scholar - Hindi (Pursuing)
institutions.description: Awadhesh Pratap Singh University, Madhya Pradesh.

institutions.name: PG Diploma in Radio & Television Journalism (2019-2020)
institutions.description: Indian Institute of Mass Communication, New Delhi.

items.title: Investigative Journalism & Fact-Checking
items.description: Expert in OSINT and verification tools for misinformation debunking and accurate reporting.

items.title: Multimedia Production
items.description: Proficient in video editing, photography, and creating compelling visual content for digital platforms.

items.title: Reporting & Storytelling
items.description: Proven record of covering protests, elections, and grassroots communities with impactful storytelling.
